ygData.subject: Re: Stein
ygData.msgSnippet: i went and got 10 steins for the casters in my guild, as well as myself... i saw one enchanter running the quest for 60pp per person. WAY undercharged IMHO. i
ygData.messageBody:
i went and got 10 steins for the casters in my guild, as well as myself...
i saw one enchanter running the quest for 60pp per person. WAY undercharged
IMHO. i STRONGLY suggest, or WISH, that enchanters would charge HIGH for
this. i am talking 500pp. they sell for 1000pp, more at bazaars. this is a
BLATANT enchanter based quest, we should get what we can out of it. there
are too god damn many steins on CT now as it is.

that's all my ranting =)

Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, 28th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule
Qoronita, 9th level Erudite Enchantress on Cazic-Thule
(let's see who reaches 30 first, heh)

>
>If anyone has been able to assist others in this quest, what are you
>charging? 50pp? 100pp?
>

-------------------
tim borrelli
computer character animator and crackhead extraordinaire
Volition, Inc.
